citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 on Jan 31,
2024.
Upon arrival I spoke with the licensee who was leaving for an educational program and could not stay for the inspection
process. Future hours of availability were discussed.
This is the first attempted inspection
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission  of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 on Jan 31, 
2024. 
 
Upon arrival I spoke with the licensee who was leaving for an educational program and could not stay for the inspection 
process. Future hours of availability were discussed.  
 
This is the first attempted inspection 
 
 
End Section
